definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a fur paste-up reel which belongs to the field of brede craftwork products.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及刺绣工艺制品领域的毛皮拼贴卷轴。

sentences.english: The type of match at the joint line must be specified.
sentences.chinese: 必须指定接口处的木皮拼贴方式。

sentences.english: Another version on the collage uses old photographs.
sentences.chinese: 另一种拼贴画是用老照片。

sentences.english: Use a Polaroid machine to create a collage with old pictures.
sentences.chinese: 使用宝丽莱机创建一个老照片拼贴。

sentences.english: Design custom wall collages and wall art with just a drag and a drop.
sentences.chinese: 设计定制的墙拼贴画和只是一个拖和下降墙艺术。

sentences.english: We'll also look at collage and perspective examples as well as make our own in class.
sentences.chinese: 在课上学生将学习做拼贴画并运用透视原理创造作品。

sentences.english: A screened print can be used for paste-up and reproduced as line copy.
sentences.chinese: 网点相片可以放于拼贴上，当作线条稿复制。

sentences.english: Enjoy this artistic application by creating original albums, greeting cards, and photo collages.
sentences.chinese: 原享受通过创建相册，贺卡和照片拼贴艺术的应用。

sentences.english: Spot collaging uses open space to create a flow between the collaged areas.
sentences.chinese: 现货拼贴使用开放空间建立地区之间的流动拼贴。

sentences.english: Spot collaging uses open space to create a flow between the collaged areas.
sentences.chinese: 现货拼贴使用开放空间建立地区之间的流动拼贴。

sentences.english: Vision boards are collages, made with images cut from magazines.
sentences.chinese: 愿景版图是拼贴画，将杂志中的图片粘贴起来。

sentences.english: The 12th Annual International Collage Exchange is on until the end of April.
sentences.chinese: 第12届国际拼贴画交流展正在进行中，直到四月末。

sentences.english: Imprints of time, collage of life.
sentences.chinese: 时间的痕迹，生活的拼贴。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Artsy Santas, Images of Santa Claus float around the screen in a moving collage.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞老人的图片在动人的抽象拼贴画中环绕屏幕浮动。

sentences.english: Collage adhesives are typically glue sticks and gel mediums.
sentences.chinese: 拼贴粘合剂通常胶棒和凝胶介质。

definition: to mix and match (of clothing etc)
to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
